mapper.select: SELECT pc.*, cr.id cr_id, cr.comment_id cr_comment_id, cr.member_nick_name cr_member_nick_name, cr.member_icon cr_member_icon, cr.content cr_content, cr.create_time cr_create_time, cr.type cr_type FROM pms_comment pc LEFT JOIN pms_comment_replay cr ON pc.id = cr.comment_id WHERE pc.show_status = 0 and pc.product_id = #{productId}

select count(1) from (select o.id,item.id item_id from oms_order o LEFT JOIN oms_order_item item on o.id=item.order_id where o.member_id=#{userId} and item.product_id=#{productId} and o.delete_status=0 and o.status=3) t
